author: glenn
msg: Updated so that href URL's can be relative so that documentation
links work correctly both on the local file system and when uploaded
to jakarta.apache.org/taglibs.  Updated the title to include the
taglib name for all taglibs which have an intro.xml.

author: jstrachan
msg: Fixed minor bug that was not using the correct variable syntax when creating XPath expressions

author: jstrachan
msg: Performed a whole host of bug fixes and added many new tags such as <param> for passing in XSLT parameters, <xalanStyle> which works like <style> but is useful for J2EE containers that still don't support JAXP1.1 (such as WebLogic 6.0 SP1). Also added <output> tag for specifying XML or HTML output and indentation text.
